backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining supported languages, API config, authorization guard, and an HTTP outcall-based transform/echo request.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short, human-written summaries of each file’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables defining the app’s light/dark theme and component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML skeleton that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the CompilerPage and notification Toaster.
frontend/src/components/compiler/CodeFra: Displays contextual code around a diagnostic location with highlighted line and caret column indicator.
frontend/src/components/compiler/Diagnos: Renders a selectable list of diagnostics and shows an inline CodeFrame for the selected item.
frontend/src/components/compiler/Results: Shows compile/run results with tabs for stdout, diagnostics, and raw stderr along with status and timing badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompileRunMutation: Defines a React Query mutation that sends compile requests to the mock compile/run client.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/backend/compileClient.t: Provides a mock compile-and-run backend that simulates delays and returns predefined or generated results.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/parseDiagno: Parses stderr text into structured diagnostics using pattern matching heuristics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap code that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CompilerPage.tsx: UI page for writing, compiling, and running code with language selection and results/diagnostics display.
frontend/src/types/compiler.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for compile requests, results, and diagnostics.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, components, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, features, and new requests for a multi-language code compiler web app with smart error handling and UI/branding assets.
